text: "Stand Back" is the debut single from Australian band Roxus. The song was included on their debut album Nightstreet (1991). The song peaked at number 44 on the Australian ARIA Chart. ==Track listing== ; Vinyl / 7" single (LS 2078) # "Stand Back" - 3:21 # "Spaghetti Wire" ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !scope="col"| Chart (1989) !scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * "Stand Back" by Roxus * Lyrics of this song - Stand Back Category:1989 debut singles Category:1989 songs Category:Roxus songs
title: Stand Back (Roxus song)
